phrs.translation: 小农场租期, 亚麻布草地曝晒漂白法, 亚麻漂白

sentences.sentence: Of the 70 or so people who live on Fair Isle, knitting and crofting mostly, 10 are children, who when they outgrow primary school must leave the island to continue their education.
sentences.translation: 费尔岛上大约有七十位居民，大多以编织和漂白亚麻为生。 岛上有十名儿童，他们到了小学毕业后就必须离开岛上到其它地方去求学。
